articles.author: Cass Marshall
articles.title: Rocksmith Plus, a guitar practice tool, arrives on PC on Sept. 6
articles.description: The guitar practice tool Rocksmith originally launched for consoles in 2014, and now it’s coming to PC as Rocksmith Plus. The service can be purchased as a subscription through the Ubisoft Store.
articles.content: On Tuesday, Ubisoft announced a release date for Rocksmith Plus, a service that helps aspiring musicians learn to play acoustic, electric, and bass guitar. Rocksmithtakes the concept of Guitar Hero a… [+960 chars]

articles.title: I Was a Teenage Exocolonist prioritized a robust content warning system
articles.description: Developer Northway Games built out a choose-your-own-adventure-style content warning system that’s got lots of options for players who want to be prepared for different types of content.

articles.author: Cass Marshall
articles.title: Legends of Runeterra’s new expansion is the start of a deadly saga
articles.description: The new Legends of Runeterra expansion, Awakening, is the start of the Darkin Saga. The expansion adds Norra, Master Yi, Ornn, Kayn and Rhaast, and Jax as champions to the game.
articles.content: The Darkin Saga begins with Awakening

articles.author: Oli Welsh
articles.title: Bomb Rush Cyberfunk release date moved to summer 2023
articles.description: The Jet Set Radio tribute will miss its scheduled 2022 release. Indie developer Team Reptile said it would not be satisfied with the game’s quality if it was released this year
articles.content:
Bomb Rush Cyberfunk, the stylish indie tribute to Segas classic Jet Set Radiogames, has been delayed from its scheduled 2022 release date into next year.

articles.author: Charlie Hall
articles.title: Dwarf Fortress has a new soundtrack, including Dwarven lyrics
articles.description: Dwarf Fortress is getting a graphical overhaul — and a new soundtrack! The announcement was made Wednesday on YouTube. Fan favorites Dabu and Simon Swerwer collaborated on the 15-track album.
articles.content:
Dabu and Simon Swerwer collaborated on the 15-song soundtrack

articles.title: Tencent and Sony acquire 30% stake in Elden Ring maker FromSoftware
articles.description: FromSoftware’s parent company announced Wednesday that Chinese conglomerate Tencent and Sony have together purchased about 30% of FromSoftware’s stock, in a deal valued at about $262 million.
